general.name: General
general.info: Not include Lunch box and provide afternoon desserts.

student.name: Student
student.info: Not include Lunch box and provide afternoon desserts.

vipa.name: Premium
vipa.info: Lunch box and afternoon desserts are included for both days, MOPCON exclusive suveniors, Priority ticketchecking lane.

vipb.name: Premium+
vipb.info: Lunch box and afternoon desserts are included for both days, MOPCON exclusive suveniors, Arm cushion, Priority ticketchecking lane, 2018 Devil Night (for one person only).

edsupport.name: Educational Support
edsupport.info: Special thanks to the educational support from principal of Hex School, Wei-Jie, who sponsors students to participate in MOPCON and encourages them to be inspired in community events
